page.title: 05Fathers Day
page.content: It is{Sunday 7.25 16th June 1985.}It's {Father's Day}and I am taking my dad a card and a gardening book with his porridge and sugar with cream.I am going{fishing}at 11.00am.I have got some time before I go.I will clean my {B.M.X. bike.}I am to meet Roger at the canal side by the pub. We have had a peaceful days fishing. I've not caught much.Three gudgeon and a ruff.It's now 5.30pm and time for {tea}we are having roast chicken ,roast potatoes ,mashed potatoes ,carrots , brussel sprouts and gravy .I will go and play on my computer it is a 48k spectrum . It is now 8.30pm time for a shower and bed .I hope to finish my book Watership Down by Richard Adams tonight .Although it will be sad to finish, as I have enjoyed it very much.
